properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued January 6 at 2:27PM PST until January 8 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and
hazardous seas 9 to 13 feet at 12 seconds expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts
up to 30 kt and seas 8 to 13 feet at 12 seconds.

* WHERE...For Hazardous seas, from Sisters Rocks To Cape Blanco.
The Small Craft Advisory is for all areas except where the
Watch is in effect.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 4 AM Tuesday to 1
AM PST Wednesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 PM
PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Bar crossing will become especially
treacherous.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for very steep seas and consider remaining in port
until conditions improve.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 1 AM PST WEDNESDAY
